fees.description: A $14.52 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A $14.52 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A fee of $15.00 (GST exempt) may apply if your bill is not paid by the due date.
If you pay at an Australia Post outlet, a payment processing fee of the higher of $2.70 or 0.49% (incl GST) may apply.
A 0.27% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA debit card.
A 0.65% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA credit card.
A 0.33% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard debit card.
A 0.67% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard credit card.
A 0.64% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by American Express credit card.
$2.15 (incl GST) applies for each paper bill.

gasContract.terms: Not available all areas or property types. SME customers only. Visit originenergy.com.au/2889/Terms-and-conditions to find out more.
gasContract.variation: We may vary the Charges (including their amount, nature and structure) by notice to you at any time. The notice will be at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of the variation.
gasContract.onExpiryDescription: The agreement continues until you or we end it.
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: You must pay us any charges your distributor imposes on us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional charges that may apply see www.originenergy.com.au/1612/Additional-charges
